DOC.brief_summary: Evaluating predictive value of serum procalcitonin, C-Reactive Protein, drain IL-6 and TNF-alpha for anastomotic leakage in post-operative period.
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Value of Procalcitonin, CRP, Drain Fluid Culture, Il-6 and Tnf-α in Anastomotic Leakage
DOC.detailed_description: To search for a biomarker, which might be able to predict rectal anastomotic leakage before its clinical presentation. Serum procalcitonin, C-reactive protein, and drain fluid culture, IL-6 and TNF-α levels were evaluated in 50 consecutive patients with rectal cancer who underwent low anterior resection with colorectal anastomosis.
